Windup 6.3.5.Final Javadoc
  • All Classes
 

Package org.jboss.windup.rules.apps.java.scan.operation.packagemapping

  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    PackageNameMappingWithOrganization
    Indicates that everything has been set, except for the ID, which is optional.
    PackageNameMappingWithPackagePattern
    Interface to assist in the construction of PackageNameMapping Rules.
  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    ArchivePackageNameIdentificationGraphChangedListener
    MutationListener responsible for identifying ArchiveModel instances based upon their contained package names.
    ArchivePackageNameIdentificationLifecycleListener
    Registers the ArchivePackageNameIdentificationGraphChangedListener.
    PackageNameMapping
    Maps from a package to a organization name.
    PackageNameMappingHandler
    Handles parsing the "package-mapping" element to add rules to the current ruleset.
    PackageNameMappingRegistry
    This registry is conceptually similar to the RuleProviderRegistryCache except that it is designed for PackageNameMapping.
